testsuite.title: GML 3.2 (ISO 19136:2007) Conformance Test Suite
testsuite.description: This executable test suite (ETS) verifies the conformance of GML data and application schemas with respect to ISO 19136:2007 (GML 3.2). It includes Version 3.2.1 and the corrigendum GML 3.2.2. It can be used to validate a GML application schema or an instance document; both types of resources are referenced by URI. A GML instance document may refer to a Schematron schema that defines application-specific constraints; this is accomplished using the xml-model processing instruction (PI) as described in ISO 19757-11. The test run arguments are summarized in the following table. The obligation descriptor can have the following values: M (mandatory), O (optional), or C (conditional). A GML application schema may be validated by itself without a referring document.

testrunargument.name: gml
testrunargument.description: An absolute URI that refers to either a representation of a GML data instance or an application schema 1.

testrunargument.name: sch
testrunargument.description: A URI referring to a Schematron schema that defines supplementary data constraints 2.

notes.note: Ampersand ('&') characters appearing within query parameter values must be percent-encoded as %26.
